1a1e9898f4afb52af0310b4e0fdb43f8e48099da:
query getPools($dateFilter: Int = 0, $first: Int = 1000, $skip: Int = 0) {
  swapPools {
    id
    asset
    lpToken
    liabilities
    totalSupply
    unlocking
    volume
    volumeUSD
    fees
    feesUSD
    lpRewards
    lpRewardsUSD
    poolDays(where: {date_gte: $dateFilter}, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc) {
      date
      id
      liabilities
      totalSupply
      unlocking
      volume
      volumeUSD
      fees
      feesUSD
      lpRewards
      lpRewardsUSD
    }
  }
}

query getPool($id: ID!, $dateFilter: Int = 0) {
  swapPool(id: $id) {
    id
    asset
    lpToken
    liabilities
    totalSupply
    unlocking
    volume
    volumeUSD
    fees
    feesUSD
    lpRewards
    lpRewardsUSD
    poolDays(where: {date_gte: $dateFilter}, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc) {
      date
      id
      liabilities
      totalSupply
      unlocking
      volume
      volumeUSD
      fees
      feesUSD
      lpRewards
      lpRewardsUSD
    }
  }
}
